Items.Name: Classic Cheeseburger
Items.Description: A juicy beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, fresh lettuce, and tomato, all sandwiched between a soft brioche bun.

Items.Name: Bacon BBQ Burger
Items.Description: A smoky BBQ sauce, crispy bacon strips, and a perfectly grilled beef patty combine to create a flavor-packed burger experience.

Items.Name: Veggie Burger
Items.Description: A hearty vegetarian patty made from black beans, quinoa, and spices, topped with avocado and served on a whole wheat bun.

Items.Name: Chicken Avocado Burger
Items.Description: Grilled chicken breast paired with creamy avocado, lettuce, and tomato, all nestled in a toasted sesame seed bun.

Items.Name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
Items.Description: A savory beef patty topped with sautéed mushrooms and melted Swiss cheese, finished with a dollop of garlic aioli.

Items.Name: Margherita Pizza
Items.Description: A classic pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, basil leaves, and a drizzle of olive oil on a thin, crispy crust.

Items.Name: Pepperoni Pizza
Items.Description: A hearty pizza loaded with spicy pepperoni slices and melted mozzarella cheese on a golden crust.

Items.Name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
Items.Description: Grilled chicken, red onions, and cilantro drizzled with tangy BBQ sauce, all atop a cheesy base.

Items.Name: Vegetarian Supreme Pizza
Items.Description: A medley of bell peppers, olives, onions, and mushrooms, topped with mozzarella and tomato sauce.

Items.Name: Four Cheese Pizza
Items.Description: A rich blend of mozzarella, cheddar, Parmesan, and blue cheese melted to perfection on a crispy crust.

Items.Name: Caesar Salad
Items.Description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with creamy Caesar dressing, crunchy croutons, and grated Parmesan cheese.

Items.Name: Greek Salad
Items.Description: A refreshing mix of cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, Kalamata olives, and feta cheese, dressed in olive oil and oregano.

Items.Name: Quinoa Salad
Items.Description: Nutty quinoa combined with chickpeas, cucumbers, and cherry tomatoes, tossed in a lemon vinaigrette.

Items.Name: Caprese Salad
Items.Description: Sliced tomatoes and fresh mozzarella layered with basil leaves, drizzled with balsamic glaze.

Items.Name: Fruit Salad
Items.Description: A colorful assortment of seasonal fruits like berries, melons, and citrus, tossed together for a refreshing treat.

Items.Name: Iced Latte
Items.Description: A smooth blend of espresso and chilled milk, served over ice for a refreshing pick-me-up.

Items.Name: Mango Smoothie
Items.Description: A creamy blend of ripe mangoes and yogurt, sweetened with a touch of honey.

Items.Name: Green Tea
Items.Description: A soothing cup of green tea, known for its antioxidants and calming properties.

Items.Name: Fresh Lemonade
Items.Description: A tangy and sweet beverage made from freshly squeezed lemons, sugar, and water.

Items.Name: Cold Brew Coffee
Items.Description: Coffee brewed slowly with cold water for a smooth, less acidic taste.

Items.Name: Chocolate Lava Cake
Items.Description: A rich chocolate cake with a molten center, served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

Items.Name: Strawberry Cheesecake
Items.Description: Creamy cheesecake topped with fresh strawberries and a drizzle of strawberry sauce.

Items.Name: Apple Pie
Items.Description: A classic dessert featuring spiced apples encased in a flaky, buttery crust.

Items.Name: Tiramisu
Items.Description: An Italian favorite made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

Items.Name: Fruit Tart
Items.Description: A buttery tart crust filled with pastry cream and topped with an assortment of fresh fruits.

Items.Name: French Fries
Items.Description: Golden, crispy fries seasoned with salt, perfect for dipping in ketchup or mayo.

Items.Name: Onion Rings
Items.Description: Crispy battered onion rings, deep-fried to perfection.

Items.Name: Mozzarella Sticks
Items.Description: Breaded and fried mozzarella cheese sticks, served with marinara sauce.

Items.Name: Chicken Wings
Items.Description: Spicy and tangy chicken wings, perfect for sharing.

Items.Name: Nachos
Items.Description: Crispy tortilla chips topped with melted cheese, jalapeños, and sour cream.
